title: Best of The Herd for Mar 03, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 03, 2020
description:
Monday night's loss is why the Bucks can't win the NBA title

OBJ needs structure and a trade out of Cleveland would put him in a better situation

The 49ers being interested in Tom Brady is a dumb story

QB campaign slogans for 2020

Guests: Lavar Ball, father of LaMelo and Lonzo Ball & Bucky Brooks, former NFL Scout/NFL Draft Analyst




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
